about_the_game:
Step into the world of "Prelude To Freedom," a Metroidvania-style 2D top-down pixel action game that immerses you in a challenging and adventurous underground prison.

In "Prelude To Freedom," you play as a hero unjustly imprisoned in a large underground prison. This prison is deeply hidden underground, spanning three levels, each filled with dangerous enemies, cunning traps, and perplexing puzzles. Your mission is to escape this heavily guarded prison, uncover its dark secrets, and ultimately regain your freedom.

The game features classic pixel art style, offering players a detailed and charming visual experience. The game world is meticulously designed, with various hidden areas and secrets waiting to be discovered. You will unlock new skills and abilities, gradually enhancing your combat power to face increasingly powerful enemies and complex environments.

The core mechanics of "Prelude To Freedom" combine intense combat with precise exploration. During your escape, you need to collect various useful items and gems to enhance your abilities. For example, the Jump Slash Gem and Dash Gem will grant you powerful attack techniques, while the Armor Gem and Soul Catcher Gem will boost your defense and recovery abilities.

Are you ready to face the challenge? Experience the tension and excitement of escaping from prison in this captivating 2D top-down action game. Uncover the truth behind the conspiracy, and embark on an epic journey towards freedom. "Prelude To Freedom" will bring you endless adventure and fun.
